publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1256 Miss Annabel Goldie: Young Musician of the Year Award-That the Parliament congratulates Nicola Benedetti on her outstanding achievement in winning the BBC young musician of the year award; recognises that this is the first time in the history of the award that the title has been won by a young Scottish musician, and welcomes the very positive image of Scotland as a centre of cultural excellence represented by the award.
S2M-1256 Young Musician of the Year Award (lodged on 4 May 2004) Colin Fox*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Murdo Fraser*

S2M-1256 Young Musician of the Year Award (lodged on 4 May 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Bill Butler*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Linda Fabiani*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Carolyn Leckie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-1256 Miss Annabel Goldie: Young Musician of the Year Award-That the Parliament congratulates Nicola Benedetti on her outstanding achievement in winning the BBC young musician of the year award; recognises that this is the first time in the history of the award that the title has been won by a young Scottish musician, and welcomes the very positive image of Scotland as a centre of cultural excellence represented by the award. Supported by: Colin Fox, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Murdo Fraser, Donald Gorrie, Bill Butler, Nicola Sturgeon, Mr Adam Ingram, Linda Fabiani, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Carolyn Leckie, Roseanna Cunningham, Ms Sandra White, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Mr David Davidson*, Bill Aitken*, David McLetchie*, Scott Barrie*, Susan Deacon*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, John Scott*, Robert Brown*, Richard Lochhead*, Alex Johnstone*, Nora Radcliffe*, Patrick Harvie*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mrs Nanette Milne*, Murray Tosh*, Margaret Mitchell*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Robin Harper*, Rob Gibson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Fiona Hyslop*, Frances Curran*
S2M-1256 Young Musician of the Year Award (lodged on 4 May 2004) Brian Adam*, Jackie Baillie*, Christine Grahame*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-1256 Young Musician of the Year Award (lodged on 4 May 2004) John Swinburne*, Rosie Kane*
S2M-1256 Young Musician of the Year Award (lodged on 4 May 2004) Mary Scanlon*
S2M-1256 Young Musician of the Year Award (lodged on 4 May 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-1256 Young Musician of the Year Award (lodged on 4 May 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
